description: Single storey side/rear extension (following demolition of existing side addition), conversion of garage into habitable room and alteration to existing ground floor rear elevation to provide bi-folding doors
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):  Existing and Proposed Ground Floor drawing no. no.A102+A202, Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Roof Plan drawing no. no.A103+A203, Existing and Proposed Loft Plan drawing no. no.A104+A204,Existing and Proposed Roof Floor drawing no. no.A105+A205, Existing and Proposed Section 1 drawing no. no.A106+A206, Existing and Proposed Section 2 drawing no. no.A107+A207, Existing and Proposed Front Elevation drawing no. no.A108+A208, Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation drawing no. no.A109+A209, Existing and Proposed Side Elevation 1 drawing no. no.A110+A210 and Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation drawing no. no.A111+A211
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
| No part of the flat roof of the approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12.
